message:
Starting C:\Windows\System32\SnippingTool.exe from Windows>Run works perfectly, but starting it from the command line gives an error because it can't be found!!

Any idea why?

data.message: Maybe, different environment variables for cmd and GUI?

it works for me in both Run , CMD and PowerShell "snippingtool" , double check the PATH values for your current user and system in the Environment Variables that includes the System32 path, may be another app changed it.
+1 to Eslam here. Works from cmd as expected.
